name: Wild Things: Animal Adventures
description:
Puzzle adventure games just got WILD! Explore an immersive world, discover hidden secrets, and build your dream habitat in the best new animal adventure game!

For generations, the Wild Things have lived peacefully in the Wildlands under the protection of the magical Tree of Life... but when a mysterious fog rolls in, it’s up to YOU to rescue cute animals and save the world of the Wild Things!

Solve match 3 puzzles to rescue animals and restore the environment! Unlocking your animal friends’ epic powers will help you blast through tons of levels and bring order to the Wildlands. What are you waiting for? The animals need your help!

With countless design and decoration options, you’ll have all the freedom to build the world of your dreams. Restore the Wildlands, meet new animals, and solve fun puzzles in Wild Things today!

DESIGN & DECORATE:
- Renovate the environment and give the habitats a complete makeover!
- Restore the Wildlands and revive the Tree of Life!
- Design and decorate every building, home, and town!
- Take your home decor and room design skills to the next level in the expansive world of the Wild Things!
- Follow new stories and discover hidden secrets!
- Explore new in-game areas and add your personal design touch!
- Decorate gardens, jungles, homes, and all other aspects of the game world!

CUTE ANIMALS:
- Rescue cute animals with BIG personalities!
- Discover fun in-game interactions with each animal friend. Make lots of animal friends to uncover their unique personalities on your magical adventure!
- Use each animal's unique ability to blast through tough puzzles!
- Customize your Wild Things with your favorite costumes!

MATCH 3 PUZZLE GAMES:
- Solve challenging match 3 puzzles to unlock magic leaves!
- Explore level after level of unique puzzle games, stories, and cute animal friends!
- Try your best to match your way through unique puzzle levels, like Harvest the Bamboo, Uncover the Penguin Eggs, and Find the Parakeet Runes!

You’re in for a wild ride! Build homes for cute animals, restore habitats, and solve match 3 puzzle games now! Play Wild Things today!
